mapper.select: select distinct(xm) from INSIGHT_XCX_CRJ order by xm

SELECT T.VDAY AS DATE,ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'入金' AS XM,'DAY' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE T.VDAY>= (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(VDAY),'YYYYMMDD')-INTERVAL'15 DAY','YYYYMMDD') FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT) AND T.VDAY <= (SELECT MAX(VDAY) FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT) GROUP BY T.VDAY --ORDER BY T.VDAY UNION ALL SELECT T.VDAY AS DATE,ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE1)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'出金' AS XM,'DAY' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE T.VDAY>= (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(VDAY),'YYYYMMDD')-INTERVAL'15 DAY','YYYYMMDD') FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT) AND T.VDAY <= (SELECT MAX(VDAY) FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT) GROUP BY T.VDAY --ORDER BY T.VDAY UNION ALL SELECT T.VDAY AS DATE,ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE2)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'净出入金' AS XM,'DAY' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE T.VDAY>= (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(VDAY),'YYYYMMDD')-INTERVAL'15 DAY','YYYYMMDD') FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT) AND T.VDAY <= (SELECT MAX(VDAY) FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT) GROUP BY T.VDAY ORDER BY xm,date --ORDER BY T.VDAY

SELECT SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') AS DATE, ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'入金' AS XM, 'WEEK' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') >= NOW() - INTERVAL '12 week' AND TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') <= NOW() group by SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') AS DATE, ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE1)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'出金' AS XM, 'WEEK' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') >= NOW() - INTERVAL '12 week' AND TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') <= NOW() group by SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') AS DATE, ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE2)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'净出入金' AS XM, 'WEEK' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') >= NOW() - INTERVAL '12 week' AND TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') < NOW() group by SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') order by xm,date

SELECT SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) AS DATE,ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'入金' AS XM,'MONTH' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) >= TO_CHAR(NOW() - INTERVAL'12 MONTH','YYYYMM') AND SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMM') GROUP BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) --ORDER BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) AS DATE,ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE1)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'出金' AS XM,'MONTH' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) >= TO_CHAR(NOW() - INTERVAL'12 MONTH','YYYYMM') AND SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMM') GROUP BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) --ORDER BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) AS DATE,ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE2)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'净出入金' AS XM,'MONTH' AS WD FROM INSIGHT_IN_OUT_AMOUNT T WHERE SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) >= TO_CHAR(NOW() - INTERVAL'12 MONTH','YYYYMM') AND SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMM') GROUP BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) ORDER BY xm,date --ORDER BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6)
